us.aaronweiss.libjinx2
Class SeekableLittleEndianAccessor

java.lang.Object
  us.aaronweiss.libjinx2.SeekableLittleEndianAccessor

public class SeekableLittleEndianAccessor
extends java.lang.Object

A seekable accessor of the little endian byte order.

Since:
1.0
Version:
1.0
Author:
Aaron Weiss
See Also:
org.angelsl.ms.libjinx.LittleEndianReader
